item.title: Simple Tuna Salad
item.description: ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 5 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 3 Ingredients 1 (7 oz) can white tuna, drained 6 tablespoons mayonnaise 1 tablespoons sweet pickle relish A pinch of garlic powder (optional) 2 tablespoons white vinegar or lemon juice (optional) 1 cup shredded cheese (optional) 1 chopped hard-boiled egg (optional) Directions In a medium bowl, stir together tuna, mayonnaise, and relish. Add optional ingredients like vinegar, cheese or hard-boiled eggs if wanted.
